dynamicFieldForm_title_message: Add new fields to existing form dynamically by specifying label, type and required field.
dynamicFieldForm_visibility_message: Switch on to display this field to users. Switch off to keep the field hidden from view
dynamicFieldForm_fieldValidation_message: Enable validation by checking this box to ensure input accuracy. Enter a custom message below to guide users on invalid input
dynamicFieldForm_helperText_example: eg: Enter your first name here
dynamicFieldForm_multipleFile_message: Toggle to allow multiple file uploads. When disabled, only one file can be uploaded
dynamicFieldForm_fieldLabelEmailInvalidM: Field Label cannot be an email address
dynamicFieldForm_fieldLabelUrlInvalidMes: Field Label cannot be an URL
dynamicFieldForm_fieldLabelLeadingSpaceM: Field Label cannot start with a space
dynamicFieldForm_fieldLabelSpacesOnlyMes: Field Label a valid label name; it cannot be composed only of spaces
dynamicFieldForm_fieldPlaceholder_Leadin: Placeholder cannot start with a space
dynamicFieldForm_fieldHelperTxt_LeadingS: Helper text cannot start with a space
dynamicFieldForm_fieldErrorTxt_LeadingSp: Error text cannot start with a space
dynamicFieldForm_field_LeadingSpaceMessa: Cannot start with comma, have leading spaces, spaces between commas, or empty values
dynamicFieldForm_fieldLabelSpecialCharsM: Only letters, numbers, and spaces are allowed.
